name: V - Center Right
_source: speak;Woman2; The most wonderful man rescued me.{w} He was dressed like a mercenary, but he had an air of elegance about him{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Of course, that was just a nice dream I had last night.{w} I like to record all of my dreams in a book at my bedside.{w} You can have it. It might give you ideas on how to defeat bandits.
